events.message: The applicant submitted the auto loan application seeking financing for a new vehicle purchase.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Auto Loan based on the vehicle financing request.
Loan officer Michael was assigned to handle this auto loan application and assist the applicant further.
An initial review of the application was conducted to verify the vehicle details and applicant eligibility.
The applicant was asked to submit proof of income, identity documents, and vehicle purchase intent paperwork.
The applicant provided all the requested documents including income verification and purchase agreement.
The applicant’s credit report was obtained and reviewed without identifying any significant issues.
Risk evaluation was completed with the borrower’s credit and vehicle type deemed acceptable by underwriting.
A loan offer detailing the terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule was formally presented to the applicant.
The applicant responded positively to the offer and requested clarification on early payoff penalties.
The application was escalated to a senior loan officer for approval due to the requested offer adjustments.
After senior review, the auto loan was approved with modified terms reflecting the applicant’s feedback.
The approved loan amount was disbursed to the dealership to complete the vehicle purchase for the applicant.
Follow-up contact was made to the borrower to ensure satisfaction and address any post-funding questions.
The loan application process was formally closed after successful funding and follow-up with the borrower.
